verses.verse: Who <WH4310> is this <WH2088> who comes <WH935> from Edom, <WH9000> With garments <WH899> of glowing <WH9144> colors <WH9144> from Bozrah, <WH1224> This <WH2088> One <WH2088> who is majestic <WH1921> in His apparel, <WH3830> Marching <WH6808> in the greatness <WH7230> of His strength <WH3581>? "It is I who speak <WH1696> in righteousness, <WH6666> mighty <WH7227> to save. <WH3467>"
Why <WH4069> is Your apparel <WH3830> red, <WH122> And Your garments <WH899> like the one who treads <WH1869> in the wine <WH1660> press <WH1660>?

"I have trodden <WH1869> the wine <WH6333> trough <WH6333> alone, <WH905> And from the peoples <WH5971> there <WH369> was no <WH369> man <WH376> with Me. I also trod <WH1869> them in My anger, <WH639> And trampled <WH7429> them in My wrath; <WH2534> And their lifeblood <WH5332> is sprinkled <WH5137> on My garments, <WH899> And I stained <WH1351> all <WH3605> My raiment. <WH4403>
"For the day <WH3117> of vengeance <WH5359> was in My heart, <WH3820> And My year <WH8141> of redemption <WH9067> has come. <WH935>

"And I looked, <WH5027> and there <WH369> was no <WH369> one <WH369> to help, <WH5826> And I was astonished <WH8074> and there <WH369> was no <WH369> one <WH369> to uphold; <WH5564> So My own arm <WH2220> brought <WH3467> salvation <WH3467> to Me; And My wrath <WH2534> upheld <WH5564> Me.
"And I trod <WH947> down <WH947> the peoples <WH5971> in My anger, <WH639> And made them drunk <WH7937> in My wrath, <WH2534> And I poured <WH3381> out their lifeblood <WH5332> on the earth. <WH776>"

I shall make <WH2142> mention <WH2142> of the lovingkindnesses <WH2617> of the Lord, <WH3068> the praises <WH8416> of the Lord, <WH3068> According <WH5921> to all <WH3605> that the Lord <WH3068> has granted <WH1580> us, And the great <WH7227> goodness <WH2898> toward the house <WH1004> of Israel, <WH3478> Which <WH834> He has granted <WH1580> them according to His compassion, <WH7356> And according to the multitude <WH7230> of His lovingkindnesses. <WH2617>
For He said, <WH559> "Surely, <WH389> they are My people, <WH5971> Sons <WH1121> who will not deal <WH8266> falsely. <WH8266>" So He became <WH1961> their Savior. <WH3467>

In all <WH3605> their affliction <WH6869> He was afflicted, <WH9496> And the angel <WH4397> of His presence <WH6440> saved <WH3467> them; In His love <WH160> and in His mercy <WH2551> He redeemed <WH1350> them; And He lifted <WH5190> them and carried <WH5375> them all <WH3605> the days <WH3117> of old. <WH5769>
But they rebelled <WH4784> And grieved <WH6087> His Holy <WH6944> Spirit; <WH7307> Therefore, He turned <WH2015> Himself to become their enemy, <WH340> He fought <WH3898> against them.

Then His people <WH5971> remembered <WH2142> the days <WH3117> of old, <WH5769> of Moses. <WH4872> Where <WH346> is He who brought <WH5927> them up out of the sea <WH3220> with the shepherds <WH7462> of His flock <WH6629>? Where <WH346> is He who put <WH7760> His Holy <WH6944> Spirit <WH7307> in the midst <WH7130> of them,

Who caused His glorious <WH8597> arm <WH2220> to go <WH1980> at the right <WH3225> hand <WH3225> of Moses, <WH4872> Who divided <WH1234> the waters <WH4325> before <WH4480> <WH6440> them to make <WH6213> for Himself an everlasting <WH5769> name, <WH8034>
Who led <WH1980> them through the depths <WH8415>? Like the horse <WH5483> in the wilderness, <WH4057> they did not stumble; <WH3782>

As the cattle <WH929> which go <WH3381> down <WH3381> into the valley, <WH1237> The Spirit <WH7307> of the Lord <WH3068> gave <WH5117> them rest. <WH5117> So <WH3651> didst Thou lead <WH5090> Thy people, <WH5971> To make <WH6213> for Thyself a glorious <WH8597> name. <WH8034>

Look <WH5027> down <WH5027> from heaven, <WH8064> and see <WH7200> from Thy holy <WH6944> and glorious <WH8597> habitation; <WH2073> Where <WH346> are Thy zeal <WH7068> and Thy mighty <WH1369> deeds <WH1369>? The stirrings <WH1995> of Thy heart <WH4578> and Thy compassion <WH7356> are restrained <WH662> toward <WH413> me.

For Thou art our Father, though <WH1> Abraham <WH3588> does not know <WH85> us, And Israel <WH3045> does not recognize <WH3478> us. Thou, O Lord, <WH5234> art our Father, Our Redeemer <WH3068> from of old <WH1> is Thy name. <WH1350>

Why, <WH4100> O Lord, <WH3068> dost Thou cause us to stray <WH8582> from Thy ways, <WH1870> And harden <WH7188> our heart <WH3820> from fearing <WH3374> Thee? Return <WH7725> for the sake <WH4616> of Thy servants, <WH5650> the tribes <WH7626> of Thy heritage. <WH5159>
Thy holy <WH6944> people <WH5971> possessed <WH3423> Thy sanctuary <WH4720> for a little <WH4705> while, <WH4705> Our adversaries <WH6862> have trodden <WH947> [it] down. <WH947>
We have become <WH1961> [like] those over whom Thou hast never <WH3808> <WH4480> <WH5769> ruled, <WH4910> [Like] those who were not called <WH7121> by Thy name. <WH8034>
